manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Description Stylish and Sexy, Lemedy Women Padded Sports Bra also a daily crop top.

Daily Life Easily to match all kinds of different clothes, simple design but can goes well with shirts, coats, dress. Perfect for your high waist leggings. Removable pads Removable pads let you choose extra concealment. Longline Sports Bra Offers comfortable support during light-impact workouts like walking, weight-training and yoga. Sweat-wicking ＆ Smoothing Super stretchy, slick, light weight, and breathable.
Please refer to measurement before you make a purchase decision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevate Your Comfort and Style with This Tank Top
reviews.reviewText: I found a fantastic addition to my activewear collection (I've purchased multiple) – this tank top combines style, functionality, and comfort in a way that has elevated my overall workout experience and everyday athleisure outfits.The design of this tank top is both chic and practical. The thoughtful cut and fit provide a flattering silhouette while allowing for unrestricted movement during various exercises. If you're in search of a stylish, functional, and comfortable tank top that enhances your workout experience, look no further.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plus sized support--Great Price
reviews.reviewText: Never thought I'd find a supportive cami-styled bra for my "girls." I ordered a 2x and was pleasantly surprised by the fit, overall comfort and support. While I don't expect any "heavy" duty lifting or support from this bra while I'm running, playing pickle ball or doing cardio, it is a perfect runner up as a well supportive undergarment for form fitting dresses, summer tops and so much more. If you're looking for a sports bra--go buy one. But if you're looking for a cute, bra that will give you all day support and not look like a harness for tig bitties--this is your bra! I recommend it, highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely adore this. I am generally a size M in tops with bra size 34DD/M or L for sports bras. I ordered the Large in this and it is awesome (also tried M - see below). It holds you in great and is super flattering. I LOVE the shelf inside this! I've never been able to go "bra-less" in tank tops and this is a game changer. I have worn this with high waisted jeans as a crop tank and also as a workout tank doing HIIT and on a walk. Haven't tried it running yet though but I typically like thicker straps when doing more running based activities. However, these straps feel very sturdy. I bought this more for classes and for wearing as a tank top so this is FANTASTIC and fits that bill perfectly. Note that I've never put it through the wash and there is already a bit of pilling at the seam so be aware of that - I will see how it holds up over time and probably will hand wash it.I did try a M and it was too tight and constricting and made me get some fat rolls underneath the band so that was a no for me. I also bought the white color in XL and that also fits well - I don't think it's *quite* as supportive as the black because it's a bit bigger but I intend to use it as a tank top and not as a workout top so it doesn't have to be as supportive imo. It's still supportive enough that my larger-ish boobs aren't falling out all over the place and look nice and perky in the top. Cups are removable.Literally going to be buying this in any color I can get my hands on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best workout top I own! Bought in 4 colors. (Blue, black, pink, & white) The tank top is VERY comfortable, the bra padding is supportive during a workout and more importantly, the bra pads don’t fall out in the dryer. Definitely recommend sizing up. This product is great, just runs VERY small. For reference, I typically am a medium. I bought this in a large and an XL. Both sizes fit, but I personally think the XL fits better and is more comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Material. Supportive. Fashionable
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my teenage daughter. She likes to wear form fitting tops, but doesn't necessarily like sports bras or shirts that restrict her movement. While my kid doesn't always tell me she likes things, I have seen this shirt in the laundry every week, so I know she is wearing it. It is a modern style and keeps everything where it is supposed to be. My daughter has a very thin build and has a hard time finding tops that fit well. If you have a kid with a ballerina build, this is the top for her. Also, the pads do not fall out in the wash cycle which is a huge plus when it comes to shirts with built in bras. Putting those things back in is a chore as I never know which way it is supposed to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Definitely order one size up. I’m usually between a XS-S. I ordered a small and it was too tight but really nice material and color

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice outside or in. Many options. Wear around doing work, run, work outs, under clothes, and as is as seller says. I believe it is true to size. Allow alittle for shrinkage. Cold water be on safe side. This is a nice color. Comfortable material. Thank you, Kathleen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These tank tops have been my summer addiction! I now have 4 colors of them and are seriously obsessed. Being larger-chested they really do hold everything in and up. I have been able to golf, play tennis and pickleball, weight-lift and do all daily activities without any worry of anything falling out or having to make adjustments throughout while wearing these.I did originally buy these as more at-home loungewear due to how some tank tops can not be suitable for outside wear with a larger chest and was so excited with how comfortable yet appropriate they are. The material is thick and none of the colors I have received yet have been see-through in the slightest. There is a built in bra shelf so the support is there and nothing shows through.I will note that I have ordered the same size (38DDD- I ordered xl’s) and some of them do fit slightly differently. The black and olive green are a bit looser and the material is stretchier. The light blue and pink one are a less stretchy material and tighter but regardless, they have all fit great and all held up in the same manner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Thought I'll give it a try and was already expecting that's it's a fail and need to send it back. But I decided to keep it as the top is quite comfortable to wear, it fits nicely and looks great. I like to have bra and top in one product. I would like to have the same top in a non-cropped style, please!

If I could give this 0 stars I would, the inserts for the cups are super thick compared to the material of the shirt which makes it very uncomfortable. The shirt also sticks out under the arm pits clearly making it not fit right and the material is like bathing suit fabric not at all the stretchy workout fabric I was expecting. This product is cheap cheap cheap and crap. Don’t waste your money!

It has the perfect cropped length and not too deep of a neckline. The fabric feels really nice quality. I was worried the straps would feel flimsy, but they don't at all. I got the white color and you can not see the pads through which is a huge plus. Will definitely get more colors.

La blusa que llego no es la que pedí, pedí un color azul marino y llego una blusa morada. La tela se ve y se siente muy chafa, no se compara para nada con la tela que se ve en la imagen. Tiene como un sports bra incluido y arriba está la tela de la camiseta pero no está nada cómodo y pica un poco. En verdad esta prenda está pésima y no tiene nada que ver con el producto que el vendedor ofrece. Este tipo de blusas es mejor comprar en tienda física porque en línea te llegan cosas horrible que no tienen que ver con el producto que pediste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on May 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Zot strak tegen het lichaam maar is niet te klein. M zit mooi voor mij met normaal maat s/m. Top is mooi afgewerkt! Waar voor je geld.
